name: Un-basketball
description:
Violence un-sport local multiplayer game!

Enjoy the game with your friend for killing each other by Basketball!

Gameplay:

Try to kill your opponent by simply one hit! Squat to avoid the attack, but please don't squat too much or you will shit a bomb!
BEWARE DIED IN YOUR SHITTY BOMB!

Control - Player 1:

Move: A,D
Squat: S
Attack: H

Control - Player 2:

Move: Left, Right
Squat: Down
Attack: Numpad 1
